alert.note: Alert for La Salle (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central La Salle County through 100 AM CDT... At 1230 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Ewell Site, or 17 miles northeast of Encinal, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Ewell Site. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
